notes: [Improved] Improved support for PHP 7.2
[Improved] Moved release feed to Github
[Fixed] Fixed incorrect template paths
[Added] Added Twig Data Source
[Added] Added support for DateTime fields in Twig Reports
[Added] Added Twig Report example files
[Added] Added support for naming reports dynamically with the Name Format setting
[Added] Added craft.sproutReports.addHeaderRow variable
[Added] Added craft.sproutReports.addRow variable
[Added] Added craft.sproutReports.addRows variable
[Added] Added PHP 5.6 compatibility
[Improved] Updated Report Groups to be ordered alphabetically
[Fixed] Fixed method signature in SproutReportsQueryDataSource
[Fixed] Fixed migration bug
[Fixed] Fixed a potential XSS vulnerability that could occur with custom Data Source integrations
[Fixed] Fixed a migration bug in where the incorrect log class was used
[Added] Added Data Source column to reports
[Added] Added 'Edit Data Sources' Permission
[Added] Added Data Source 'Allow New?' option to allow access to whether Reports can be created from a particular Data Source
[Improved] Updated display of Report index page
[Fixed] Fixed 'Edit Reports' permission on some pages where it was not in use
[Fixed] Fixed 'Download' button on Results page
[Fixed] Fixed bug where dynamically editing Report settings from Results page didn't save settings
[Fixed] Fixed 'Save and Continue Editing' option when saving a Report
[Fixed] Fixed horizontal scroll on Results page
[Improved] Added New Report button with dropdown of all report options on Report index page
[Improved] Improved workflow around creating and deleting Report Groups
[Fixed] Fixed bug where updating a Report dynamically did not reflect the updated settings in the results
[Fixed] Fixed bug where User Report would throw an error on installations using Craft Personal
[Added] Added support for update options on the fly when running a report on the Report page
[Added] Added Fields Datasource which can generate reports to help manage fields
[Improved] Updated settings settings to be managed in plugin's Settings section
[Improved] Updates SproutReportsBaseDataSource::getDefaultLabels method signature to accept a SproutReports_ReportModel and options.
[Added] Added PHP 7 compatibility
[Fixed] Fixed bug where editing a report didn't load the selected Report Group
[Fixed] Fixed grid layout on Report edit page for large screens
# Custom Reports & DataSources

Sprout Reports now supports custom Reports, Report Options, and Data Sources. Reports have full control over what options they allow a user to select. Additional Reports and Data Sources can be added by plugins. Data Sources can define data available within Craft or beyond!
[Added] Added support for custom DataSources
[Added] Added support for custom Reports
[Added] Added support for custom Report Options
[Added] Added Custom Query DataSource
[Added] Added Users DataSource
[Added] Added Category Usage by Section DataSource
[Added] Added Users and User Groups Report
[Added] Added option for Reports now display a description
[Added] Added registerSproutReportsDataSources hook
[Added] Added SproutReports_ReportsService::registerReports method
[Improved] Updated behavior of Number widget to return the result count if a result set has multiple records
# General Updates
[Added] Control Panel has been updated to work with Craft 2.5
[Added] Added Plugin icon
[Added] Added Plugin description
[Added] Added link to documentation
[Added] Added link to plugin settings
[Added] Added link to release feed
[Added] Added subnav in place of tabs for top level navigation
[Added] Added support for CSRF protection
[Added] Export CSV button on results page
[Added] Adds sproutReports-editReports permission
[Added] Adds sproutReports-editSettings permission
[Improved] Updated CSV export to use `league/csv` (Requires PHP >= 5.5.0 and the mbstring extension)
[Improved] Various UI updates and improvements
[Added] Added query validation by disallowing unsafe commands
[Added] Added modifier flag for table prefix replacement and command escaping
[Added] Added better error reporting on report edit and result pages
[Added] Added ability to 'Save and Continue' or 'Save and Add Another' report
[Added] Added support for Cmd+S to save reports
[Added] Added ability to add and filter reports by groups
[Added] Added ability to add, update, rename, and delete report groups
[Improved] Integrated Single Number Report widget with reports
[Improved] Improved code spacing, organization, and conventions
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where the edit page would throw an error for new reports
[Fixed] Fixed the way CDbExceptions are handled in the service layer
[Added] Private beta
